<rule id="javaee-to-jakarta-namespaces-00033" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile as="xml-file" matches="p:persistence[@version='2.1']">
                    <namespace prefix="p" uri="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/persistence"/>
                </xmlfile>
                <filecontent as="result" from="xml-file" pattern="version={quotes}2.1{quotes}"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration over="result">
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the Java EE version with the Jakarta equivalent">
                        <message>In the root tag, replace the `version` attribute value `2.1` with `3.0`</message>
                        <link href="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence/#3" title="Jakarta Persistence XML Schemas"/>
                        <quickfix name="javaee-namespaces-replace-persistence-version" type="REPLACE">
                            <replacement>3.0</replacement>
                            <search>2.1</search>
                        </quickfix>
                    </hint>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
            <where param="quotes">
                <matches pattern="("|')"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
